mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EMPLOYMENT (EM_ID, EM_COMPONY, EM_POST, EM_PEOPLE, EM_ADD, EM_EDU, EM_SALARY, EM_EXP, EM_DATE) VALUES (EMPLOYMENT_SQL.nextval,#{EM_COMPONY},#{EM_POST},#{EM_PEOPLE},#{EM_ADD},#{EM_EDU},#{EM_SALARY},#{EM_EXP},#{EM_DATE})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn,T_EMPLOYMENT.* FROM T_EMPLOYMENT WHERE rownum <= #{pageSize}) g where g.rn >=#{currentPage}
